word_mean: 高温计：一种用以测定热强度的仪器，特别是用来测定水银温度计不能测定的温度

sentence.Network_en: Furnace temperatures for heat treating shall be effectively controlled by pyrometer.
sentence.Network_cn: 热处理炉温将采用高温计有效控制.

sentence.Network_en: The constitution of algorithm and software implementation for this pyrometer is mainly introduced in details.
sentence.Network_cn: 主要介绍了该测温仪的算法构造和软件实现.

sentence.Network_en: The radiance signals from shocked methane gases were recorded by an instantaneous six channel pyrometer system.
